includedAssets.title: Toy Story
includedAssets.synopsis: Animation was never the same after this unrivalled combination of comedy, adventure and computer wizardry. Tom Hanks voices Woody, the rag cowboy whose position as the best-loved plaything in the room comes under threat with the arrival of hi-tech space hero Buzz Lightyear (Tim Allen). The fact that John Lasseter's creation was the first animated feature to be generated entirely in pixel form is by-the-by; what matters is that its tale of friendship and teamwork twangs every emotional chord on its mission to cartoon infinity - and beyond. Genius.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Pixar's brilliant toy box tale follows the rivalry between playthings Woody the cowboy and space adventurer Buzz Lightyear.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Animation was never the same after this unrivalled combination of comedy, adventure and computer wizardry. Tom Hanks voices Woody, the rag cowboy whose position as the best-loved plaything in the room comes under threat with the arrival of hi-tech space hero Buzz Lightyear (Tim Allen). The fact that John Lasseter's creation was the first animated feature to be generated entirely in pixel form is by-the-by; what matters is that its tale of friendship and teamwork twangs every emotional chord on its mission to cartoon infinity - and beyond. Genius.

includedAssets.title: Toy Story 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Saddle up, pardners, for the sequel that takes audiences to the heights of Pixar's ground-breaking, computer-animated classic... and beyond. When rag cowboy Woody (Tom Hanks) is snatched by a greedy toy merchant, space hero Buzz Lightyear (Tim Allen) rounds up the playbox posse to bring him home. But with a new set of friends depending on him, Woody can feel his loyalties coming apart at the seams. An irresistible treat.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Woody is captured by a toy collector, it's up to Buzz and pals to save the day. Ace animation from Pixar, with the voice of Tom Hanks.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Saddle up, pardners, for the sequel that takes audiences to the heights of Pixar's ground-breaking, computer-animated classic... and beyond. When rag cowboy Woody (Tom Hanks) is snatched by a greedy toy merchant, space hero Buzz Lightyear (Tim Allen) rounds up the playbox posse to bring him home. But with a new set of friends depending on him, Woody can feel his loyalties coming apart at the seams. An irresistible treat.

includedAssets.title: Toy Story 3
includedAssets.synopsis: Andy is heading off to college, and his toys, including Woody (Tom Hanks) and Buzz (Tim Allen), are worried about their uncertain future. After some twists and turns, the toys end up at Sunnyside Daycare Center where they meet new playmates such as Lots-o'-Huggin' Bear (Ned Beatty), a stuffy porcupine named Mr. Pricklepants (Timothy Dalton), and a smooth-talking Ken doll (Michael Keaton). Once again, Pixar blow us away with a fun-filled, endearing and action-packed family hit which went on to win Oscars for animation and score.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When the toys are donated to a terrifying day-care centre, Woody must mastermind a plan to get home. Oscar-winning animation from Pixar.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Andy is heading off to college, and his toys, including Woody (Tom Hanks) and Buzz (Tim Allen), are worried about their uncertain future. includedAssets.title: Toy Story
includedAssets.synopsis: Ever wondered what your toys do when you’re not there? Classic Pixar animated trilogy about the adventures of Woody, Buzz and the gang. Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Wallace Shawn, John Ratzenberger, Jim Varney and Estelle Harris star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ever wondered what your toys do when you’re not there? Pixar animation about the adventures of Buzz, Woody and the gang. Tom Hanks and Tim Allen star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ever wondered what your toys do when you’re not there? Classic Pixar animated trilogy about the adventures of Woody, Buzz and the gang. Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, Joan Cusack, Don Rickles, Wallace Shawn, John Ratzenberger, Jim Varney and Estelle Harris star.

includedIn.title: Toy Story
includedIn.synopsis: Animated adventures abound as a group of toys come to life when their owner's back is turned. After years of harmonious fun, the arrival of a shiny new plaything sparks rivalry at the heart of the gang, but the toys are forced to pull together when they find themselves in peril.
